subject: Windows Vista Business ready to download
body:
It is easier to forgive an enemy than a friend.

With true friends... even water drunk together is sweet enough.


If you want to achieve excellence, you can get there today. As of this second, quit doing less-than-excellent work.

Home is the place where, when you have to go there, They have to take you in.

He that lives to forever, never fears dying.

Even when the experts all agree, they may well be mistaken.

Flattery is like cologne water, to be smelt, not swallowed.

One of the darkest evils of our world is surely the unteachable wildness of the Good.

Happiness is not best achieved by those who seek it directly.

One who imitates what is bad always goes beyond his model while one who imitates what is good always comes up short of it.

Choosing goals that are important to you is one of the most essential things you can do in order to live your dreams.

Food is an important part of a balanced diet.

None of us liveth to himself, and no man dieth to himself. [Romans 14:7]
